comment: I'll spare you from hundreds of analyses by following generations of chess players. After endless debate they have agreed that 19. Rad1 was better than the alternative 19.Be4. Now the best reply was 19...Rg4!, which would pose some difficult problems for White, but in the emerging wild complications White would, in my opinion, retain the upper hand.
reasoning: The comment accurately explains the mistake made by the player in choosing 19.Rad1 over 19.Be4, stating that the best reply was 19...Rg4, which would have given Black a significant advantage in the resulting complex position.
